title:
eternal Presence

Friend, when you feel broken , lost, far from home, when something seems to be aligned...

attachments.displayName:
eternal Presence

Friend, when you feel broken , lost, far from home, when something seems to be aligned completely distant and the words of the wise rather resemble a fairy tale , when you feel that the answers do not come and that doubts will consume as fire ...

Stop. Breathe . Remember , nothing is going 'wrong' . A dream is dying , that's all , a dream second hand about how 'should' be this time ...

When all that mess call your attention , when doubts crazy sing their melody, when stories are left come as waterfalls , remember that the same nostalgia that trying to eliminate is really inviting you to your true home , the Here and Now , far of all ' home ' earthly .

A problem is something your sweet craving attention. A crisis is a turning point. The disease is an invitation to a deep relaxation and release . Trauma is the invitation to such acceptance than ever imagined before. Those doubts gnaw you are explosions of supreme intelligence , making a call for deep trust in your own firsthand experience , is a call to let yourself fall into the embrace of the unknown constant .

Even when everything seems to go wrong , stop, take a breath and remember that nothing can go 'wrong' in the vast field of your eternal presence .
